resources.string: Camera permission is required to classify waste.
Paper: Recycle in the blue bin. Ensure it\'s clean and dry.
Plastic: Recycle in the yellow bin. Rinse containers to remove residue.
Metal: Recycle in the yellow bin. Remove any non-metal parts.
Glass: Recycle in the green bin. Separate by color if required.
Cardboard: Recycle in the blue bin. Flatten boxes to save space.
Trash: Dispose in the black bin. Avoid mixing with recyclables.
